product.description: A modern and revolutionary PoS for ramping up your business

errors.minLength: Minimum lenght for this field is {{min}}

apiErrors.InvalidPassword:
The password is invalid.
Minimum Lenght: {{requiredLength}} characters
apiErrors.Duplicate: A entry with this value already exists

operations.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete entry {{name}} of {{entity}}?
operations.deleteManyDescription: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} entries of {{entity}}?

failure.form: Some form fields are incorrect. No changes were made.
failure.generic: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again

common.dragAndDropFiles: Drag and drop your files here. The allowed files are: {{files}}
common.name: Name

tpa.name: TPA
tpa.description:
For experience similar to a terminal payment operated by a user
Ex: TPA or street vending

onSite.name: On site
onSite.description:
For consumptions extended through time
Ex: Restaurant table or disco cards

online.name: Online
online.description:
For ordering at a distance
Ex: Online store or Take-Away or Delivery

selection.selectAll: To select all entries, other pages included, click here

guestApp.settingsDescription: Configure how it will be displayed for QR code guests

employeeRestrictionsDescriptions.RemoveItems: If employee can remove items from sessions
employeeRestrictionsDescriptions.OnlyOwnTransactions: If employee can access transactions of other employees
employeeRestrictionsDescriptions.OnlyTransactionsOfLast24Hours: If the employee has unlimited access over time

notificationTypeDescriptions.FailedCharge: Printed when a client fails an app payment
notificationTypeDescriptions.ExpiredCharge: Printed when a client starts payment via app but it expires
notificationTypeDescriptions.PosOffline: Printed when connection to the PoS is offilne
notificationTypeDescriptions.PosSyncFailure: Printed when syncing failure with PoS occurs
notificationTypeDescriptions.PosPaymentSyncFailure: Printed when a payment synchronization with PoS fails
notificationTypeDescriptions.CompletedCharge: Printed when an app payment was received
notificationTypeDescriptions.NewOrder: Printed when a client performs and order via app
notificationTypeDescriptions.NewReview: Printed when a client leaves a review via app
notificationTypeDescriptions.NewConsumerBill: Printed when requesting a consumer bill
notificationTypeDescriptions.NewPreparationRequest: Printed when a requesting the preparation of items
notificationTypeDescriptions.ChargeSynced: Printed when a paymend with PoS was synced
notificationTypeDescriptions.EndOfDayClosing: Printed when requesting an end of day closing

pos.openDescription:
You are about to open PoS in a new tab. Would you like to close session?
Keeping an open session allows employees access to this portal and potentially access sensitive data.

signUp.title: Sign Up
signUp.signUpDescription: Create an account to start PoS revolution
signUp.signUpCompletedDescription: A confirmation email was sent to your email address. Click the email link to complete signing up.

signUpConfirm.title: Email confirmation
signUpConfirm.confirmingYourEmailDescription: Please stand by while we confirm your email address. After confirmation, you will be able to sign in and access Quivi.
signUpConfirm.tokenExpiredDescription: Your email could not be confirmed since the link already expired. We sent you another fresh link. Please check your inbox for another link.
signUpConfirm.emailConfirmedDescription: Your email was confirmed successfully! You can now sign in.

signIn.title: Sign In
signIn.signInDescription: Welcome to Quivi! Enter your credentials to sign in.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot my password
forgotPassword.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter the email address linked to your account. An email will be sent with instructions to retrieve your password
forgotPassword.emailSentDescription: An email containing instructions on how to reset your password was sent. Please check your inbox for the next steps.

recoverPassword.title: Recover Password
recoverPassword.passwordChangedDescription: Your password was changed successfully! You can now sign in using you new password.

onboarding.title: Onboarding
onboarding.description: Some steps are still required before using Quivi. Bellow you will find a list of things you need to complete to unlock Quivi.

createMerchant.description: Information regarding your business is required

termsAndConditions.description: Before starting to use Quivi, activate it by reading and accepting our terms and conditions.

createChannelProfile.description: Create a profile for your sales channels. This profile can be assigned to channels and will determine how they will operate. It contains several configurations like on which POS it will comunicate with.

createChannel.description: Add one or more sales channels. A channel represents a virtual or physical location on which you can operate sales. On a restaurant, for instance, tables are channels. On an hotel a room is a channel. It can also be an online store, a kiosk, etc.

channels.title: Channels
channels.defineCreateIntervalDescription:
The range can have alfanumeric values but the start value and end value must have the same format.
Example: 1 to 10 or A1 to A10.
channels.editMultipleWarning: Changed will be applied to all previously selected channels

menuItems.title: Item
menuItems.locationDescription: Set the location where this item will be printed and sent for preparation. In case the item doesn't have a location, you will need to set it at each preparation request.
menuItems.availabilityPeriodsDescription: Define time periods throughout the week when the item is available

employees.title: Employees
employees.restrictionsDescription: Set which actions and what information the employee will have access to.
employees.resetPinDescription: Are you sure you want to reset pin of employee {{name}}?

printers.title: Printers
printers.notificationsDescription: Configure the documents the printer will handle.
printers.locationDescription: Configure the location of this printer. This printer will only print requests or items assigned to the selected location.
printers.printerWorkerDescription: Configure the printer service responsible to communicate with the printer. The printer service needs to either be connected via USB to the printer or connected to the same network as the printer.
